plot: After the death of her kindly and protective grandmother, Yeong-ah learns that she was adopted and her abusive, unhappy family is not her real one so she sets out to locate her birth mother.
title: Itji mothal mojeong
plot_es: After the death of her kindly and protective grandmother, Yeong-ah learns that she was adopted and her abusive, unhappy family is not her real one so she sets out to locate her birth mother.
plot_en: After the death of her kindly and protective grandmother, Yeong-ah learns that she was adopted and her abusive, unhappy family is not her real one so she sets out to locate her birth mother.
